RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 199 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 120323 MMX, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision for an amendment to the City Map involving: \par
